Entries.George: {{Random: It's awful cold, isn't it? What a rotten day.++Why do I even bother getting out of bed when the day looks like this?++My hip aches. Weather ain't making this any better.|inputSeparator=++}}

Entries.Tue8: My medications make me sleepy all the time.$s
Entries.movieTheater: Oh, @, we have a movie theater again!$h#$e#Think I'll take Evelyn, we used to go to the movies every Friday night.
Entries.winter_7{{YearRemainder}}: Everyone expects me to be cheery for the Festival. Hrmph.#$b#It's cold, @, no good for my knee.

Entries.1_2: Evelyn and I've been living in this here valley for a very long time, @. My family's been living here for as long as we can remember.$h#$b#Ain't no place like our dear Pelican Town.
Entries.3_2: Pelican Town used to be so much bigger, back when the mines were still active.#$b#Now? I don't know how the younguns' are gonna find jobs around these parts.
Entries.5_2: Sometimes I worry about the kids. Some of them don't seem to be able to do anything away from their computers.
Entries.7_2: Between you and I, @, the pension ain't nearly enough some days.$s
Entries.9_2: Let's see...I need to take these once in the mornin', once at noon and once at night? With food each time?
Entries.11_2: Guess even bein' a non-union shop didn't let Joja squeeze enough profit out of them mines to hang around.$s
Entries.13_2: Them mines are quite dangerous now. Didn't used to be so overrun with monsters when I worked there.$s
Entries.17_2: A lot of people have moved out of the valley over the years. Not Evelyn and I, though. This is our home.

Entries.1_2: @, this year's cost-of-living adjustment for my pension isn't keeping up with inflation at all.#$b#Guess Evelyn and I will have to scrimp and save more than usual...
Entries.2_2: Evelyn made some cookies and said I couldn't have any. My blood sugar, she says.$s#$b#My own wife is enforcing doc's orders against me.
Entries.3_2: Did I take my mornin' meds? I can't remember...$s
Entries.17_2: Feel like every time I go to see Dr. Harvey I've got more medications I've gotta take...$s
